name: Iosefka's clinic
description: You are in a small medical room, a LANTERN (L) on the damaged floor illuminates the surroundings. Judging by the blood covered INSTRUMENTS (L) next to the beds, they are used to perform blood ministration on patients. The only interesting things here are the SHELVES (L) and a BAG (L) left on one of the beds. There is a WOLF (F) beast blocking the only way out, the confrontation is inevitable.
altDescription: You are in a small medical room, a LANTERN (L) on the damaged floor illuminates the surroundings. Judging by the blood covered INSTRUMENTS (L) next to the beds, they are used to perform blood ministration on patients. The only interesting things here are the SHELVES (L) and a BAG (L) left on one of the beds.

attributes.description: NORTH -> Graveyard, the path is blocked by a WOLF (F) beast
attributes.conditionFalseText: The monster is still alive you can't go this way yet

attributes.description: EAST -> Back clinic, the door is locked from the other side
attributes.conditionFalseText: The door is locked from the other side.

name: Back clinic
description: You are in the back of the clinic, the atmosphere here is different from the rest of the facility, everything is quiet as after a storm, it is unsettling. A BRAINSUCKER (F) is in the middle of an operating ROOM (L), there is an old CABINET (L) behind him. He clearly detected you but doesn't seem to be aggressive yet. In a second operating room, there is a wooden CHEST (L).
altDescription: You are in the back of the clinic, the atmosphere here is different from the rest of the facility, everything is quiet as after a storm, it is unsettling. The brainsucker's corpse is in the middle of an operating ROOM (L), there is an old CABINET (L) behind it. In a second operating room, there is a wooden CHEST (L).

attributes.description: WEST -> Iosefka's clinic, unlock the DOOR (A) to open it and allow free passage in both ways
attributes.conditionFalseText: The door is locked unlock the DOOR (A) to open it.

name: Graveyard
description: You find yourself in a graveyard filled with tombstones of Yharnamites. One particular TOMBSTONE (L) seems to belong to an ancient hunter. The area is encircled by a high wall blocking view of the city behind.
altDescription: No alt description for this area, if you see this it's a bug !

attributes.description: EAST -> Graveyard annex, the path is blocked by a metal gate
attributes.conditionFalseText: The iron gate is closed by a mechanism, you can't open it from this side.

name: Graveyard annex
description: As you look around, you realise you are back in Yharnam, in a smaller part of the graveyard. You notice the presence of multiple carrion CROWS (F) gathered around a CORPSE (L), they did not see you yet. A small courtyard adjoins this part of the graveyard, with a large TREE (L) in its center.
altDescription: As you look around, you realise you are back in Yharnam, in a smaller part of the graveyard. The dead carrion crows are scattered around a CORPSE (L). A small courtyard adjoins this part of the graveyard, with a large TREE (L) in its center.

attributes.description: WEST -> Graveyard annex, the path is blocked by a metal gate
attributes.conditionFalseText: The iron gate is closed by a mechanism, you must activate the LEVER (A) to unlock the mechanism blocking it.

name: Street
description: You are in one of the many twisting streets of Yharnam. On the left, COFFINS (L) are piled up and padlocked. To go and search them you have to deal with the HUNTSMEN (F) who are blocking your way.
altDescription: You are in one of the many twisting streets of Yharnam. On the left, COFFINS (L) are piled up and padlocked. The bodies of the huntsmen you killed are scattered around.

attributes.description: WEST -> Small Square, there is a ladder but its currently out of reach, activate the LEVER (A) next to it to make it drop down
attributes.conditionFalseText: The ladder is still out of your reach, you must activate the LEVER (A) to make it drop down.

attributes.description: NORTH -> Pyre, the path is blocked by a metal gate
attributes.conditionFalseText: The iron gate is closed by a mechanism, you can't open it from this side.

name: Dead end
description: You arrive in a straight path, an EXECUTIONER (F) blocks you from going to it's end where you see many CRATES (L) and some COFFINS (L) scattered around.
altDescription: You arrive in a straight path, you see many CRATES (L) and some COFFINS (L) scattered around the back of the area. Now that the executioner is dead you can safely go search through their content.

name: Small square
description: You are in a small square, a LANTERN (L) lights up the surroundings, creating eldritch shadows on the walls. You see an open WINDOW (L) on a house close to you.
altDescription: No alt description for this area, if you see this it's a bug !

attributes.description: WEST -> Small path, the path is blocked by a metal gate
attributes.conditionFalseText: The iron gate is closed by a mechanism, you can't open it from this side.

name: Small path
description: You are on a path that passes under the great bridge. At the end of the bridge is an elevator that leads to the aqueduct. Some huntsmen MINIONS (F) are wandering not far from you. You can see the CLOCKTOWER (L) overlooking the city from here.
altDescription: You are on a path that passes under the great bridge. At the end of the bridge is an elevator that leads to the aqueduct. The corpses of the huntsmen minions are lying in the middle of the paved road. You can see the CLOCKTOWER (L) overlooking the city from here.

attributes.description: NORTH -> Aqueduct, the elevator is down and you can't call it, you must find a way to go down to reactivate it
attributes.conditionFalseText: You can't go this way yet, the elevator is not activated.

attributes.description: SOUTH -> Small square, the path is blocked by a metal gate, you can open it by using the LEVER (A) next to it
attributes.conditionFalseText: The iron gate is closed by a mechanism, you must activate the LEVER (A) to unlock the mechanism blocking it.

name: House
description: You enter a house in a deplorable state, the floor is covered with dust, the windows are broken and the walls are decrepit. You notice the presence of a few corpses scattered around, in more or less good condition. One of them, a grandpa in a wheelchair, seems almost still alive, in front of him there is a very old FURNITURE (L).
altDescription: No alt description for this area, if you see this it's a bug !

name: Pyre
description: You arrive in an open street where some blood-drunk HUNTSMEN (F) built a PYRE (L) to burn a wolf beast. A huge DOOR (L) to the north shakes regularly as if something was hitting it. Some wooden CRATES (L) are piled up on the right.
altDescription: You arrive in an open street where some blood-drunk huntsmen built a PYRE (L) to burn a wolf beast. A huge DOOR (L) to the north shakes regularly as if something was hitting it. Some wooden CRATES (L) are piled up on the right.

attributes.description: EAST -> House, the entrance is blocked by a HUNTSMAN (F) he looks frustrated and ready to burn you down
attributes.conditionFalseText: The monster is still alive you can't go this way yet

attributes.description: SOUTH -> Street, the path is blocked by a metal gate, you can open it by using the LEVER (A) next to it
attributes.conditionFalseText: The iron gate is closed by a mechanism, you must activate the LEVER (A) to unlock the mechanism blocking it.
There is no such exit here.

name: House
description: You are in the living room of a house. There is a MAN (TK) sitting on a chair on your left. He seems lost in his thoughts and concerned. Only a fine light trail pierces through the window on the back wall but you can see a CHEST (L) with a cut off human arm next to it.
altDescription: No alt description for this area, if you see this it's a bug !

name: Fountain square
description: You arrive at a square. A stone and metal fountain is enthroned in the centre, it is rusted and the water in it doesn't seem clean, nobody has maintained it for a long time. There is an old WELL (L) behind the fountain with some benches around it. A huntsman MINION (F) is knocking on a huge door and is probably the reason you saw it shake from the other side. A metal FENCE (L) is in a very bad state on your right. There is an open WINDOW (L) near the way down the sewers.
altDescription: You arrive at a square. A stone and metal fountain is enthroned in the centre, it is rusted and the water in it doesn't seem clean, nobody has maintained it for a long time. There is an old WELL (L) behind the fountain with some benches around it. A metal FENCE (L) is in a very bad state on your right. There is an open WINDOW (L) near the way down the sewers.

attributes.conditionFalseText: There is no such exit here.

name: Lower sewers
description: You are in the lower part of the sewers of Yharnam. A few lanterns on the walls dimly illuminate the area but you can discern some ROTTED CORPSES (F) not far away. A heap of RUBBISH (L) is on your right.
altDescription: You are in the lower part of the sewers of Yharnam. A few lanterns on the walls dimly illuminate the area but you can discern the rotted corpses you killed not far away. A heap of RUBBISH (L) is on your right.

name: Upper sewers
description: You are in the upper part of the sewers, the surroundings are not very attractive, the canal is filled with tainted water. You can see a man-eater BOAR (F) at the end of it, it guards some CORPSES (L), probably it's last meals.
altDescription: You are in the upper part of the sewers, the surroundings are not very attractive, the canal is filled with tainted water. The CORPSES (L) that were previously guarded by the man-eater boar are now free to search.

name: Great bridge
description: You are on the Great bridge of Yharnam, from here you see the majority of the CITY (L). There is a huge PILE (L) of bones behind a STAGECOACH (L) on the left side. A WOLF (L) beast is roaming nearby.
altDescription: You are on the Great bridge of Yharnam, from here you see the majority of the CITY (L). There is a huge PILE (L) of bones behind a STAGECOACH (L) on the left side.

attributes.description: WEST -> Bridge end, the path is blocked by a second WOLF (F) beast
attributes.conditionFalseText: The monster is still alive you can't go this way yet

attributes.description: EAST -> Great bridge, the path is blocked by the CLERIC BEAST (F)
attributes.conditionFalseText: The boss is still alive you can't go this way yet

attributes.description: SOUTH -> Small path, you must reactivate the ELEVATOR (A) to use it
attributes.conditionFalseText: You can't go up yet, you must reactivate the ELEVATOR (A).

attributes.description: SOUTH -> Aqueduct, the path is blocked by FATHER GASCOIGNE (F)
attributes.conditionFalseText: The boss is still alive you can't go this way yet
